meanings.sent1: The water filter can demineralize the tap water, making it cleaner to drink.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended a special toothpaste to demineralize the plaque on my teeth.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally left my mineral water in the sun, and it got demineralized into plain water!
meanings.sent4: The harsh chemicals in the cleaning solution demineralized the surface of the countertop.
meanings.sent5: The scientist used a special process to demineralize the soil sample for analysis.

meanings.sent1: The acidic soil can demineralize the plant, causing it to wither.
meanings.sent2: The excessive use of fertilizers can demineralize the farmland over time.
meanings.sent3: The naughty squirrel tried to demineralize the bird feeder by chewing on it!
meanings.sent4: The relentless waves slowly demineralized the rocks along the shore.
meanings.sent5: The prolonged exposure to sunlight can demineralize the vitamins in fruits.
